title: FS: 5 different T202's - all SGC graded - HOFers and more
author: scooter729

posts.post_title: FS: 5 different T202's - all SGC graded - HOFers and more
posts.post_content:
Hi,

I have the following T202's for sale.  All are graded SGC - I'll try and describe as best I can, since I know my scanner isn't the absolute best.  All do present very nicely!

Updated so only those described here are still avaialble.


Hal Chase Too Late - Amby McConnell and Matty McIntyre - SGC 30 - light wear but nothing major - looks nice - $45

Scoring From Second - Rube Oldring and Bris Lord - SGC 30 - crease in the middle but not too bad - $45

Shipping is included in the prices and any payment form is accepted.  Shoot me a PM with any questions - thanks for looking!

Scott
Received baker/ Collins, great card.  T202's in the sgc cases are impressive, the first time I can say I prefer slabbed to raw.  Thanks again.

[quote name="Econteachert205" post=1323511]Received baker/ Collins, great card.  T202's in the sgc cases are impressive, the first time I can say I prefer slabbed to raw.  Thanks again.[/QUOTE]


Thanks Dennis - appreciate it!  That was quick delivery!  And I agree - the cases are very nice on these cards - just graded before the new flips.

Scott
Updated for price bumps and to remove those which have sold...
